name: Engineered To Design
tagline: Taking your ideas and sketches above and beyond
body:
# Welcome 
ETD is a professional service run by qualified engineers with years of experiences spanning multiple industries. We can provide drawings and designs tailored to yours needs that you can be confident will assist your professionalism and product development. 


  
  




## 2D CAD Drafting
 We offer all 2D CAD services, from entirely fresh designs to modification of existing drawings. 
#####Architectural
#####Building Services
#####Layouts
#####Piping and Instrument Diagrams
 
  

## 3D CAD Drafting 
If you have come up with an idea that you would like to be professionally drafted for further development, let our service take your sketches into the digital world. Our 3D modelling will allow you to accurately determine dimensions and tolerances, easily modifying any aspect. We specialise in taking your ideas through to manufacture, with the ability to have your designs taken for local or foreign fabrication and manufacture.
  


##About Us
We are a Sydney, Australia based engineering company. Our Chief Design Engineer holds a Bachelor of Engineering (Mechanical, Honours I) from the University of Sydney, holding years of diverse experience within the engineering industry and having developed CAD drawing systems, standards and countless technical designs for large businesses. 

  

## Contact
For your convenience, our service can be offered entirely via email with quick turn around. Alternatively, our business can offer face-to-face visits to allow you to vary your drawings or designs on the spot.
  

For more information, please email
enquiry@engineeredtodesign.com.au
